title: Almost New Luxury Apartment, Utilities Included
posting_body: Looking for quiet, friendly, responsible, clean person for almost new apartment.
Looking for folks who are respectful, neighborly and considerate with many great neighbors.
Background check and credit report will be done.
We're environmentally conscientious with the apartment being 100% sustainable energy.
-	Dishwasher, laundry in unit, fridge with ice maker, vented range, microwave, disposal
-	Tons of on-street parking next to apartment
-	A short walk to beautiful Franklin Park, public transportation and the Audubon Nature Center
-	1st and last mo rent, plus security, no fees
-       20 minutes to airport and Longwood Medical area
-       5 minute drive to the night life, shops and restaurants on Dorchester Ave.
